scripts.restart: pkill -f 'tsx watch' || pkill -f 'vite' || true && sleep 1 && pnpm dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter client build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules shared/node_modules client/dist server/dist
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter client typecheck && pnpm --filter server typecheck
